name: SUPER CONDUCTOR (paddegroda, Kapoter1447)
description:
SUPER CONDUCTOR

You work as a SUPER CONDUCTOR to earn as much money as possible in a single day. Being a SUPER CONDUCTOR  means that you control an entire train by yourself. Theres a lot to do,  check tickets, throw off those who does not have one, deliver to cupes, serve food and trowing off bombs.

WASD - move

SHIFT - run

SPACE - jump (hold to jump higher)

LEFT CLICK - interact

RIGHT CLICK - bring up interface
